description: Opens with "paintings" of historical events with voice over explaining that magic was unknown, then scenes of Zero leaving the cave, then miscellaneous scenes from the series mixed with character credits. Final scene is the giant magic-cancelling spell, followed by the book closing and broadcast info. (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HphuhsgRVfo [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HphuhsgRVfo])
